title: Sudden Lag/Packet Loss yet ping/FPS is normal?
body:
Been playing frequently all week and had little to no problems apart from drops in FPS, trying to fix this I turned to the "low frame rate troubleshooting" support thread; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting
I then realized my display drivers were abouy a year or so out of date and proceeded to update them, before carrying on I don't know if it's worth mentioning I use a MSI GS70 2QC laptop (specs https://www.msi.com/Laptop/gs70-2qc-stealth.html#hero-overview). 
After updating my drivers I then continued to run the client's full system repair, after I restarted my laptop and loaded up league. 
Went into game and found there seemed like a huge amount of lag, not that my champion was responding slowly but that it seems jumpy/choppy/scratchy etcetc, I looked to my ping and FPS and both were within my normal expected ranges: FPS between 60-80 and ping 20-30, I then changed the graphics to there minimum and still this jumpy issues persisted even with the frame rate increasing.. I also increased the quality to its maximum and even then the ping and FPS were pretty standard though the jumping seemed alot more severe. 
Read that it could potentially be packet loss? Not really sure and what else to say,

Cheers.

replies.body: Hmmmm you may be onto something with that packet loss suspicion. Let's test for that really quickly by using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) first. Use the game logs that had that weird lag, take a screenshot, and post it here where I can go over it with you!

Sorry for lateness of reply, took 3 screen shots of the logs, 2 games played recently and one maybe a month or two ago (if it's worth mentioning a month ago I was living else where with a different internet provider which was much better 19ms where as here its often around 30ms, though even with this higher ping I never noticed such harsh jumpiness) :

2 recent games with jumpiness:
http://imgur.com/a/G0uzD
http://imgur.com/a/3kH1t
game where I was living else where:
http://imgur.com/a/PBV0C

Need to know anything else please let me know or if you need more logs

Cheers 


Edit: Just played a game with probably the most noticeable lag/glichiness but I frequently checked the FPS and ping and they remained within my usual ranges of about 70-90 FPS and 30ms ping. This game was weirder though, I was able to move my character and see every other character move but I couldn't see any abilities, and if a minion died, the health bar disappeared but they were still moving and fighting, after a few seconds suddenly all the abilities could be shown and the minions without health bars suddenly died...

The above mention game:
http://imgur.com/a/LmCsy

Yeeeaaa it looks like that packet loss is most likely what's getting in the way here. Most of the time this type of lag is centered around your ISP, but there's still a few things we can check on your end. Reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and shoot them the logs you used in that log reader.

Same issue from Belgium for two days.
Ping is constant at 34ms and good fps but I have 2-3 sec lags where nothing register or moves.
Having the same packet loss issues. had 3 games now with it but game prior to that it was fine and other games are fine. please fix it!
